text: Jizō Bosatsu stands on a lotus platform and holds a wish-granting jewel and staff. The statue retains some of its original gold leaf decoration and polychrome, and features crystal insets in the eyes, a common feature of sculptures from this period. Jizō is often portrayed as a travelling monk who crosses through the worldly spheres from heaven to hell, helping those who call his name.
